body:

wife alsoo that pink head is cute & crazy now I can't wait for ch 37

I hope the wife keeps cheating on the guy. The title is Household Affairs... ofc there's gonna be cheating.. (thats the erotic thing about it). I would be super pissed off if the husband and wife have a happy ending together...  My ideal ending would be wife x pizza delivery guy.. and husband dead or with the fucked up girl.

The amount of mindfuck the wife must be going through.  I dont condone her shit one bit, but I understand how she feels all too well. Still...fucking coworker needs to know you place and someone needs to kick her little yandere ass.

The wife is a fuckin hypocrite, as she is sucking and fucking on another guy she says she will leave her husband if he's cheating. I can't express in words how much she pisses me off but just know it's on a whole different level
